author: anon.
statepreservation: 3 short lines from a column broken at top and at bottom.
hand: medium to fair-sized, informal, round, leaning forward, not aiming at bilinearity and rather irregular, rapidly and proficiently written, giving the impression of being cursive; the letters are closely spaced and often linked, though without real ligatures; the rapid, practised, almost semi-cursive hand does not particularly suggest a school context, assumed by the editors mainly on the basis of the content
